original_title: Opry Video Classics: Queens of Country 2
overview: Two of the the best voices in country music belong to Connie Smith and Loretta Lynn, who followed in the footsteps of the “Queen of Country Music,” Kitty Wells. Queens of Country 2 captures all of these acts, plus three future megastars. Lynn Anderson was only 19 when she appeared here at the Opry. Crystal Gayle performs as a twenty-year-old balladeer, while Dolly Parton had just turned 21 when Dumb Blondehit the charts on 1/21/67.
title: Opry Video Classics: Queens of Country 2
